Document.TEXT: Web ERP Arabian International Company Welcome to the AIC Website. AIC, Arabian International Company, corporate headquarter is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia. We are a leading designer, fabricator and erector of Structural Steel, Process Equipment, Plate Work, Storage Tanks, Pipe Spools and Towers with state of the art fabrication facilities in Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom and China in addition to two dedicated engineering offices in Egypt & Jordan. AIC is also a part of the Attieh Group based in Saudi Arabia, which was founded in 1956. AIC is managed by dedicated and qualified professionals, who are committed to understanding and serving the needs of our clients. AIC is known for the quality of its products and services and for its attention to safety and we are determined to maintain our high standards through continuous improvement of processes and procedures. Our organization and plants are quality certified ( ISO 9001, ISO14001 & OHSAS18001 ) and operate and certified according to best business practices ( AISC, FCP to AWS1.1, AWS1.8 & BS5950, ASME A/ U/ S/ PP). AIC has been serving the needs of the Oil and Gas, Refining, Petrochemical, Power, Smelting, Steel, Cement, Desalination and other industrial and commercial projects since 1994 supported by more than 5,700 employees and a large fleet of Equipment. The Company is structured into five main divisions: Structural Steel, Tower & Galvanizing, Construction, Transport & Heavy Equipment, and Platework & Piping. High quality, timely delivery and satisfied customers have been the key to our success. We have worked hard to establish a long-term business relationship with our customers who have responded by coming back repeatedly for their project requirements. If you are one of these customers, welcome back. If you have not previously worked with AIC , we would be delighted to hear from you and look forward to serving you.
